short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends native messages to Azentio PANINI Control for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Process and scan checks, of PANINI MyVisionX cheque scanner device, and send the data as Base64 string to the provided URL. It can scan cheques with MICR code or OCR code.
